Class SCOContentDMChecker

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.util.SCOContentDMChecker

public class SCOContentDMChecker
extends java.lang.Object

Checks to see if a S1000D data module is a 4.1 SCO content data module.

Constructor Summary

Method Summary
static boolean isSCOContentDM(java.io.File dataModule)
          Parses a data module to see if the infoCode is 960 which indicates a SCO content data module.

isSCOContentDM

public static boolean isSCOContentDM(java.io.File dataModule)
Parses a data module to see if the infoCode is 960 which indicates a SCO content data module.

Parameters:
dataModule - File that represents a data module file.
Returns:
